entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Blowing snow. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Blowing snow late in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
